turns.user_message: I'm looking to schedule a doctor visit for a health issue I've been ignoring.

If you're unsure, we can start with a general practitioner. Would you like to check for local options or telehealth services?

user_profile.name: Samir Al-Hassan
user_profile.description: Samir is a 60-year-old Middle Eastern man with intermediate tech skills. He approaches life with an analytical mindset but tends to make decisions impulsively, which has led him to seek out a doctor visit for a nagging health concern he has been putting off. His casual communication style and moderate expressiveness allow him to comfortably share his thoughts, and with extensive experience in navigating medical systems, he feels adaptable in scheduling appointments whenever necessary.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

additional_requirements: Access to patient reviews for doctors
